text: Mackenzie Phillips (November 10, 1959) is an American actress and musician who began acting when still a child. She starred as Carol Morrison in American Graffiti and Julie in the sitcom One Day at a Time. Phillips was born in Alexandria, Virginia, though raised in California. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Actors from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Mackenzie Phillips
